'''Freda''' is an event-exclusive [[NPC]] who appeared in [[Alchemical Ascension]].

==Profile==
Freda is a knight working in its logistics company. She likes to go on adventures. She helps bring new supplies for the Traveler and Paimon.

===Appearance===
She has brown hair, golden eye, a silver chestplate, and dons the attire of the Knights of Favonius.
